question: I wanted to know how to pray namaz tahujjud?
answer:
QUESTION

I wanted to know how to pray namaz tahujjud?

I also wanted to know if there is a surah or doah that can be read to help remove stress in everyday life?

Surely Allah knows best.

JazzackAllah,

ANSWER


Share:

Assalamu Alaikum Warahmatullah

 

Brother/Sister in Islam

 

1)      Salatul  tahjjud (Qiyamul layl) is a voluntary (nafl) Salah. It may be performed in units (Rakats) of two. The intention of the Salah should be tahajjud or nafl Salah. Recite sura fatiha and and a sura in both rakats. You could make dua in Arabic in the ruku or sajdah postures as well in Arabic.

 

2) Everyone generally experience some level of stress everyday. It is not you alone. The recitation of darud (salawt upon nabi (saw) it is very useful. You may also consider taking some stress relief tablets.

 

And Allah Knows Best

 

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
